casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Karriem EARP, Defendant-Petitioner. C-945 September Term 2017
080290 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 15, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004293-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the trial court for resentencing during which the trial court will expressly state the reasons for not finding mitigating factors four and seven. Jurisdiction is not retained.
